name: Skin Bat
senses: blindsight 20 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn. On a success, the target can't be paralyzed in this way by the skin bat again for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The skin bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Hungry Dead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The skin bat doesn't require air or sleep.
